variants.gltf_detailedDescription: An array of variational identifiers, all of which map to the associated material.

material.gltf_detailedDescription: A reference to the material associated with the given array of tags.

name.description: The user-defined name of this variant material mapping.
name.gltf_detailedDescription: The optional user-defined name of this variant material mapping.  This is not necessarily unique.
